books.title: The Midnight Library
books.author: Matt Haig
books.description: Between life and death there is a library, and within that library, the shelves go on forever. Every book provides a chance to try another life you could have lived.

books.title: Project Hail Mary
books.author: Andy Weir
books.description: A lone astronaut must save the earth from disaster in this incredible new science-based thriller from the author of The Martian.

books.title: The Silent Patient
books.author: Alex Michaelides
books.description: A woman's act of violence against her husband and her subsequent silence lead to a psychological thriller.

books.title: Atomic Habits
books.author: James Clear
books.description: An easy and proven way to build good habits and break bad ones with tiny changes that lead to remarkable results.

books.title: Where the Crawdads Sing
books.author: Delia Owens
books.description: A coming-of-age story set in the marshes of North Carolina about a young woman who raised herself in isolation.

books.title: Educated
books.author: Tara Westover
books.description: A memoir about a young woman who leaves her survivalist family and goes on to earn a PhD from Cambridge University.

books.title: The Seven Husbands of Evelyn Hugo
books.author: Taylor Jenkins Reid
books.description: An aging Hollywood icon reveals the secrets of her glamorous and scandalous life to a young journalist.

books.title: The Invisible Life of Addie LaRue
books.author: V.E. Schwab
books.description: A woman makes a Faustian bargain to live forever but is cursed to be forgotten by everyone she meets.

books.title: Sapiens
books.author: Yuval Noah Harari
books.description: A brief history of humankind exploring how Homo sapiens came to dominate the world.

books.title: Dune
books.author: Frank Herbert
books.description: Set on the desert planet Arrakis, this epic science fiction novel follows young Paul Atreides.

books.title: Becoming
books.author: Michelle Obama
books.description: The memoir of former First Lady Michelle Obama, chronicling her life from childhood to the White House.

books.title: The Thursday Murder Club
books.author: Richard Osman
books.description: Four unlikely friends meet weekly to discuss unsolved murders, until they find themselves in the middle of a real case.

books.title: Circe
books.author: Madeline Miller
books.description: A retelling of Greek mythology focused on the witch Circe and her journey of self-discovery.

books.title: The Art of War
books.author: Sun Tzu
books.description: Ancient Chinese military treatise with timeless strategies applicable to business and life.

books.title: Anxious People
books.author: Fredrik Backman
books.description: A heartfelt comedy about a failed bank robbery that turns into a hostage situation at an apartment viewing.

books.title: The Song of Achilles
books.author: Madeline Miller
books.description: A reimagining of the Iliad told from the perspective of Patroclus, companion of the legendary warrior Achilles.

books.author: George Orwell
books.description: A dystopian social science fiction novel about life under totalitarian rule.

books.title: The Alchemist
books.author: Paulo Coelho
books.description: A philosophical story about a young Andalusian shepherd on his quest to find treasure and his personal legend.

books.title: The Psychology of Money
books.author: Morgan Housel
books.description: Timeless lessons on wealth, greed, and happiness doing well with money.

books.title: It Ends with Us
books.author: Colleen Hoover
books.description: A novel about a woman caught between her first love and the man who seems perfect for her.
